rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
'restricted the import' describes action taken, not high-potency framing of the threat.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
Reports restrictions, lacking explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation of the specified types.
Describes action taken (a measure/safeguard) ('Colombia has restricted the import of beef').
